analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x171cbf5688468ad08ab4f3594e5aa4f299e24c44.sol:
	Contract LICOToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x171cbf5688468ad08ab4f3594e5aa4f299e24c44.sol#302-303)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

StandardToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/47/0x171cbf5688468ad08ab4f3594e5aa4f299e24c44.sol#180-206)
	- /unique_chucks/47/0x171cbf5688468ad08ab4f3594e5aa4f299e24c44.sol#188-191
